name: Fantasy Football Strike
description:
The world champion is coming, choosing your teammates and defeating the opponent, becoming the final champion!

This game has famous football elites from all over the world and it is time for the challenge!

It’s time to show real skills and beat your opponent with subtle football skills!

Game features:
*Diversified fitting systems: A wide variety of jerseys and sneakers can be used to create different team players. We have various colors and effects,even powerful football can help you win the championship.

* Multiple game modes:
There are 7 game modes: leveling mode, limited time shooting, limited ball shooting, 0 error shooting, ball shooting, grand prix and custom shooting, which fully test the player's shooting ability.

*Multiple discount package rewards:
There will be huge discounts of gold coins, ticket packages, and a chance to get free jerseys regularly, and you also get chance to get a powerful football to help you become a superstar

* Easy to operate:
Using your fingers facing the goal, you can complete the perfect shot and easily become a top star. Do not hesitate, joining this exciting decisive world champion simulation football game!
It's time to show your true football strength!
